short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Builds a command line for 'curl/wget' tools to enable the download of data on a console only session.
short.fr: CurlWget g√©nere le texte pour curl et wget afin de pouvoir telecharger un fichier en mode 'ligne de commande'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CurlWget provides the 'curl' or 'wget' command line string of a downloaded file. This is useful to replicate the download on headless servers / non graphical sessions, etc.
long.fr: Builds a command line for 'curl/wget' tools to enable the download of data on a console only session.
